name: Leap The Gap, Duck!
description:
BUG FOUND: Can't view leaderboard in WEBGL because mixed HTTP/HTTPS content is not allowed. (I will update the leaderboard to HTTPS later, but for now use the desktop version if you would like to submit to the leaderboard).

I actually submitted this project to multiple jams.

Wowie Jam Theme ~ Collaborate with AI

The player must collaborate with an AI by placing platforms where the AI may land.

Score Space Jam Theme ~ Absorb

When the AI lands on the platform, the player must absorb the AI's fall by left clicking.

Lets Talk Game Jam Theme ~ Game's Initials must be L.T.G.D

The game is named "Leap The Gap, Duck!"

With that out of the way, I hope you enjoy!
